اما a-mā see│a


اما ammā (with foll . ف fa) as to, as for, as far as... is concerned; but; yet, however, on the other hand│اما بعد (ba‘du) (a formular phrase linking introduction and actual subject of a book or letter, approx.:) now then …, now to our topic: ...


اما immā if; اما -- واما be it -- or, either – or (also اما -- او)
